document.title: Calm Morning — Behind the Shot
document.description: Notes on light, timing, and why I kept the palette restrained.

body.raw:
A short intro paragraph to set context.

## The scene
Describe the location, time, and conditions.

## Approach
What you looked for, how you framed it, and why.

## Gear & settings
- Camera: …
- Lens: …
- 1/125s at f/8, ISO 200

<Photo src="/images/portfolio/calm-morning.jpg" alt="Calm morning over the water" />
